name: The Cybernetic Slums
description: This is a crumbled side of the Neon City, where people salvage technology and create makeshift cybernetics for their survival. Amidst ramshackle buildings, meandering wires form a complex network overhead, connecting disparate pieces of tech, some of which is quite advanced. It is a neighborhood filled with the hum of generators, the sputtering of old neon lights, and the determined spirit of those who refuse to be left behind.

travel_descriptions.east: From the heart of the Cybernetic Slums, you navigate the labyrinth of ramshackle buildings, back into Neon City. As you follow the rising sun, the meandering, wire-laced skyline gives way to towering skyscrapers and digital billboards, and the hum of barely-there generators is replaced by the constant melody of city traffic.
